scripts.rebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run fetch+build
scripts.fetch+build: pnpm run fetch && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run save && pnpm run generate
scripts.clean: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { console.error('⚠️ Must run on Linux/macOS/WSL'); process.exit(1); } else { require('child_process').execSync('rm -f ../../assets/icons/*.svg', {stdio:'inherit'}) }"
scripts.format:ci: pnpm run format:imports && pnpm run format:code
